item.title: @elonmusk: Grok Imagine Tip: Don't necessarily try to use all 6 seconds of a video. To create rhythm, sometimes...
item.description: Grok Imagine Tip: Don't necessarily try to use all 6 seconds of a video. To create rhythm, sometimes you need to generate a lot of video and cut it up to make the action more dynamic.
